title: Stand For Ukraine
description: Protect the innocent.Provide for families.We stand with Ukraine.Across the globe authors have come together to provide stories filled with hope, heart and understanding, inspired by the events of February 2022.STAND FOR UKRAINE is a collection of romance, women’s fiction and poetry. Proceeds go to Save the Children’s efforts to provide Ukrainian children with food, warmth, shelter and psychological support.Authors:Aarti V Raman, Ally Vance, Amanda Cuff, A McCarty, Andie Bale, Pandora Snow, Anna Klein, Anna Volkin, Annee Jones, April A.
